thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Saudi Arabia Signals Commitment to Oil-Production Cuts

author: Summer Said
title: Saudi Arabia Signals Commitment to Oil-Production Cuts
text:
Saudi Arabia said it would continue limiting its crude-oil output, signaling the world’s top oil exporter remained committed to production caps and underscoring a split with Iran’s call for gradually lifting output curbs.
In an unusual news release Wednesday, Saudi Arabia’s national oil company said its crude output would remain below 10 million barrels a day and its exports below 7 million barrels a day. Saudi Arabian Oil Co. has the capacity to pump as much as 12 million barrels a day, but it has limited its output along...
